content: d yo 3 times pulling st to rs 2 2 front insert hook in top of triangle back insert hook into top of triangle mesh st straight down 2 row yo pull mesh st straight down 2 row yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook 3 up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook 3 times times step 4 \f or \b yo pulling st to f or b as step 4 \f or \b yo pulling st to f or b as indicated insert hook in next triangle indicated insert hook in next triangle mesh st yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 mesh st yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook lps on hook step 5 -l yo 3 times pulling st to rs step 5 -l yo 3 times pulling st to rs 1 1 front insert hook 1 mesh stitch to the back insert hook 1 mesh stitch to the left of left leg step 4 of triangle mesh left of left leg step 4 of triangle mesh st yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on st yo pull up lp yo pull thru 2 lps on hook 3 times hook 3 times step 6 yo pull thru all lps on hook to step 6 yo pull thru all lps on hook to complete the stitch chain 2 continue to complete the stitch chain 2 continue to next* triangle mesh stitch next* triangle mesh stitch *the first leg of the next triangle mesh stitch will always begin in the same stitch as the last leg of the previous triangle mesh stitch step 4 was worked ©2022 kathryn a clark page 9 of 12 #m22-001  chart 1 snowflake snowflake design  ©2022 kathryn a clark page 10 of 12 #m22-001  chart 2 create your own design  ©2022 kathryn a clark page 11 of 12 #m22-001  afghan idea  ©2022 kathryn a clark page 12 of 12 #m22-001
